languages.text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.
languages.original_text: Использование {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на зону Стратегического плана во второй раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} возвращает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Срабатывает не более 1 раза за ход.

traits.locale_text: Affecting a Combat Tactics area with a stratagem for the second time in a turn refunds 1 AP. This effect is activated once per each turn.
Using a stratagem on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a turn refunds 1 AP. This effect can be activated once per turn.

Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.

Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.

languages.text: Использование {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на зону Стратегического плана во второй раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} возвращает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}. Срабатывает не более 1 раза за ход.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.

traits.locale_text: Использование стратагемы на зону Стратегического плана во второй раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} возвращает 1 ОД. Срабатывает не более 1 раза за ход.
Использование стратагемы на зону Стратегического плана во второй раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} возвращает 1 ОД. Срабатывает не более 1 раза за ход.

languages.text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}回合{/g}内，第二次对某个战斗策略区域使用{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}时，会返还1点{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}行动点数{/g}。此效果每回合可触发一次。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.

traits.locale_text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内，第二次对某个战斗策略区域使用战略能力时，会返还1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。此效果每回合可触发一次。

languages.text: Usar una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} por segunda vez en un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en una zona creada mediante Tácticas de combate devuelve 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Este efecto puede activarse una vez por turno.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.

traits.locale_text: Usar una estratagema por segunda vez en un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en una zona creada mediante Tácticas de combate devuelve 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Este efecto puede activarse una vez por turno.

languages.text: Die zweite Anwendung eines Strategems auf ein {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiet in demselben <b>{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} gibt 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück. Dieser Effekt kann einmal pro Zug aktiviert werden.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.

traits.locale_text: Die zweite Anwendung eines Strategems auf ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet in derselben {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} gibt 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück. Dieser Effekt kann einmal pro Runde aktiviert werden.

languages.text: L'utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagème{/g} dans une zone de Tactiques de combat pour la deuxième fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} entraîne le remboursement de 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cet effet peut être activé une fois par tour.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation d'un Stratagème dans une zone de Tactiques de Combat pour la deuxième fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} entraîne le remboursement de 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Cet effet peut être activé une fois par tour.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に軍略範囲内に{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を2回使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が1払い戻される。この効果は1ターンに1回だけ発動する。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に軍略範囲内に計略を2回使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が1払い戻される。この効果は1ターンに1回だけ発動する。

languages.text: Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} bir Çatışma Taktikleri alanında ikinci kez {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kullanmak, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP'yi{/g} geri kazandırır. Bu etki, bir turda yalnızca bir kez etkinleştirilebilir.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area for the second time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} refunds 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. This effect can be activated once per turn.
